snippet.title: Drop It: Block Paradise! Builder Edition - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Build your own unique puzzle levels and share them with friends! Endless online database filled with levels!

This is a completely free Steam Game coming later this year focused on making Puzzle Levels and sharing them with others online.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2894250/Drop_It_Block_Paradise_Builder_Edition/
